most_active_tickets.title: Unable to open Pieces Core Services
Cannot connect to Authentication site during install of Pieces

common_issues.title: Users unable to connect to Authentication site during Pieces install
common_issues.description: Users on Windows and MacOS are encountering authentication errors during Pieces installation, potentially due to security software like Cortex XDR blocking connections.  The error manifests as an UnauthenticatedUserException with a redirect to an authentication error URL.  Users should check their firewall/security software settings and allowlist Pieces domains if necessary.

related_issues.title: Cannot connect to Authentication site during install of Pieces
related_issues.text:
Cannot connect to Authentication site during install of Pieces
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I end up at this url:

https://pieces.app/authentication-error?sentry_id=00000000000000000000000000000000&os=917d9227-e6ca-45d6-ae1a-c6b76b70a5c1&platform=windows

Please note:  This is when I install Pieces as part of the UltraEdit 2025.0 install on my work VDI.
Our VDIs have Cortex XDR for security so this may be blocking it.  If so, I probably can't use Pieces at work.  I highly doubt they will open any ports for this.

recommendations: Investigate the authentication error during Pieces installation, focusing on compatibility with security software like Cortex XDR.
Prioritize resolution of issue #855 ('Unable to open Pieces Core Services') due to its high activity level.
Address the root cause of the 'UnauthenticatedUserException' error affecting both Windows and MacOS users.
Provide clear instructions or documentation for users on how to configure their firewall/security software to allowlist Pieces domains.
Monitor and track the frequency of authentication-related issues to identify any trends or patterns.
